unnormalised: Arre yaar, hi online payment scene kitlo ghonchgolit assa! Myntraveller saree khatir ₹2500 dile, punn mhojem bank statement Rs 2,500.00 debit zalelem dakhoita. Ani, ₹100 cashback-ui azun credit zaunk na. Customer care-ak phone kelo, tannim 24 hrs ravonk sanglem. Asha kortam, tem soglem sarkhem zatolem!
normalised: Arre yaar, online payment scene kitlo ulpaapta! Myntra-cher saree khatir don hazar panchshe rupiya dile, punn mazy bank statement-an don hazar panchshe rupiya kadlele dista. Tasech, ek she rupiyanchi cashback azun zama zaleli na. Customer care-ak phone kelo, tanne chovis horam ravonk sanglle. Ashaa asa, te sarkhem zatlem!
text: Arre yaar, hi online payment scene kitlo ghonchgolit assa! Myntraveller saree khatir ₹2500 dile, punn mhojem bank statement Rs 2,500.00 debit zalelem dakhoita. Ani, ₹100 cashback-ui azun credit zaunk na. Customer care-ak phone kelo, tannim 24 hrs ravonk sanglem. Asha kortam, tem soglem sarkhem zatolem!
